content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (2.0, 0.0) and (4.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- New furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### Coal Insertion Mechanism
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal inserted into furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Coal inserted into furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. For example, coal must be present to insert into the furnaces.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Repeated errors when inserting coal into new furnace
- Check your inventory for coal before trying to insert it into the new furnace. If you are out of coal, you will not be able to perform the action.
